data.title: 6D.ai
data.meta_description: Building the 3D map of the world. With just a smartphone camera, 6D.ai's SDK creates a 3D mesh of the world around you. App developers can easily relocalize multiple cross-platform players into the same coordinate system. Objects remain persistent across sessions while respecting occlusion.
data.text:
6D.ai is Now Part of Niantic Helping to Build The AR Cloud

The next platform is not a device, it is a 1:1 machine-readable map of the world that all apps will run on. Some call this the Mirrorworld or AR Cloud.

6D.ai is now part of the Niantic Real World Platform team working to offer developers the ability to incorporate the real world into their products. Niantic’s leading research and engineering teams are working to build spatial computing technologies for better AR experiences, with millions of players contributing points of interest to the 3D map of the world.

To get on the list for private access to Niantic’s AR Platform, please apply to the Niantic Creator Program.
